pr_title: CALCITE-4434 fix cannot implement 'CASE row WHEN row...'

timeline.message: CALCITE-4434 fix cannot implement 'CASE row WHEN row...'

timeline.bodyText:
Can you give an example for CASE (deptno, job) WHEN (20, 'CLERK') THEN 1, what is the exprs.get(0) and exprs.get(1)?
Is exprs.get(0) (deptno, job and  exprs.get(1) (20, 'CLERK')
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText: Actually why need to remove cast?
timeline.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText: If you have to remove cast, then better to add a test that include CAST to show the difference?
replies.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText: ROW operation naturally includes a Cast outside. so the example test already has it.
replies.author: zinking
